item.title: Content-aware image resizing in JavaScript | Trekhleb
item.description: JavaScript implementation of so-called Seam Carving algorithm for the content-aware image resizing and objects removal. Dynamic programming approach is applied to optimize the resizing time.

item.description: Hello and welcome to the new Twisted Fields technical blog. Twisted Fields is a research farm in San Gregorio, on the beautiful California coast right next to Silicon Valley. Today we are very proud to announce a project we have been working on for just under two years. Acorn is a precision farming rover we have developed in house to aid in farming automation research. Acorn is solar powered, lightweight, and completely open source. Our plan is to build a community around the ...
